messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/25/2003 2:10:37 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
ssweethws@... writes:


> !" My husband and I discussed it further
> and knew this is what we need to do. I did not commit to this for my
> children (1) to hate learning and (2) butting heads with my dd on a
> day to day basis. It seems to be that way lately and I feel down and
> out about it. SO, HERE WE ARE!

Sheila,

Consider two things:

Valerie Fitzenreiter's new book, The Unprocessed Child, and teh Live & Learn
Unschooling Conference in Columbia, SC August 22-24, 2003

http://schoolsoutsupport.org/2003conference.html

And Welcome!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
